answers.text:
"""Vacations Madlib.
This program asks the user for
two adjectives
and two nouns, which are then
used to print
a funny story about a vacation.
The code uses
four variables to store the user
input: two for
the adjectives, and two for the
nouns. The
output is displayed on seven
lines, beginning
with a blank line after the
input.
"""

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The amount of information in this docstring is just right.
